Title: Happy journey - The great leader Chairman Mao inspected navy vessels and troops for the first time in February 1953, together with Navy warriors
Designer: Navy Fine Arts' Workers collective (海军美术工作者集体)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The image refers to the 'Naval Inspection Tour' of February 1953. This tour was undertaken by Mao and Luo Ruiqing (who was under under heavy attack during the Cultural Revolution and not mentioned here).
